title: The Wolf Man 1941 colorized (Lon Chaney Jr)

sources.title: The Wolf Man 1941 colorized (Lon Chaney Jr)
sources.description: After returning to his father's castle in Wales, a man is bitten by a wolf who turns out to be the werewolf son of a mysterious gypsy fortune teller. directed by George Waggner      written by Curt Siodmak Lon Chaney Jr. as Lawrence Talbot / The Wolf Man Claude Rains as Sir John Talbot Ralph Bellamy as Colonel Montford Warren William as Dr. Lloyd Patric Knowles as Frank Andrews Bela Lugosi as Bela Maria Ouspenskaya as Maleva Evelyn Ankers as Gwen Conliffe I colorized this using AI software that doesn't always get the colors right, but I think it looks fairly natural. Hopefully a more professional job will be done someday.
